I am a second year student at University of British Columbia. I am interested in app development - familiar with Android platform, starting out with iOS soon. I am experienced with Java 6/7 and C. I have worked with Javascript(as you can see) and Backbone.JS. Currently learning NodeJS and Python.

When Iâ€™m not doing my homework, hanging out with my friends, or skiing, you can find me working on different projects, learning new programming languages, watching and reading tutorials and trying out different APIs.
I speak Russian. Recently, I started skiing, and am proud to tell you that after 4 times visiting the slopes, I am an official blue trails member.
